alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 6:43PM CST until January 09 at 7:30PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... Southern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... West central Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... Central Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 730 PM CST. * At 643 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Midtown Mobile to near Tillmans Corner to Grand Bay, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Daphne, Tillmans Corner, Fairhope, Gonzalez, Foley, Theodore, Spanish Fort, Grand Bay, Robertsdale, Point Clear, Loxley, Magnolia Springs, Stapleton, Molino, Summerdale, Silverhill and Elberta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
